evidence.claim: AIMA leverages AWS services including Lambda and RDS for its cloud infrastructure.
The company implements HIPAA compliance measures in its health-tech solutions, ensuring data security and privacy.
AIMA uses FHIR APIs for interoperability in healthcare data exchange.
Integration with Microsoft Azure for data processing and storage.
Utilizes RESTful APIs and webhooks for seamless application integrations.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transaction capabilities or specific use cases identified on their site.
